summary: REQ-26 image assets were not added (no new files in the diff). App.tsx was updated to use getAssetUrl(...) for the default main image, but the diff snippet is truncated and does not conclusively show the required secondary image rendering or confirm absence of absolute-root asset paths.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all homepage references to the new default assets use `getAssetUrl(...)` (no `src="/assets/..."` absolute-root paths).
